tool_description: Large text to speech (TTS) API enables you to perform unlimited* text to speech synthesis (English) in single request.  With human like voice quality! Read more in About section.
title: Large text to speech

api_list.name: Create TTS job
api_list.description: Request for text to speech job
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://large-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/tts"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "large-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get job status
api_list.description: Get the status and results of a job

import requests

url = "https://large-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/tts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "large-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://large-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/tts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "large-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
